main event: Retired TSGT Charles E. Peterson observed a bright, star-like object while lying on his back on July 21, 1964.
interesting points: The object was bright and bluish-white, observed slightly below the moon and 45 degrees above the horizon,The sighting lasted for about 20 minutes,The object moved in a straight line toward the north and briefly paused,Peterson noted it passed through the first and second stars of the handle of the Big Dipper,Peterson had prior intelligence experience regarding UFO incidents.
witness description: Retired TSGT with intelligence operations experience in the Air Force
